name: Acid Farming Simulator
description:
What about carrots? Discover the Acid Farmland in this short platformer created for Duality Tilemaps Jam!

Controls
  1. 'AD' or 'LeftRight' to move
  2. Ctrl to drill
  3. Space to jump
  4. R to reload
  5. ESC to exit game
Rules

Most important: don't let the evil harvester cog catch you!


Collect all of the carrots to open up the exit!


Drill through the terrain!


Source is available at GitLab
